metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14378 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
ip_reass in ip_input.c in libslirp 4.0.0 has a heap-based buffer overflowvia a large packet because it mishandles a case involving the firstfragment.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

qemu - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-block-extra - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-guest-agent - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-kvm - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-aarch64 - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-arm - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-common - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-mips - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-misc - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-ppc - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-s390x - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-sparc - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-system-x86 - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-user - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-user-binfmt - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-user-static - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
qemu-utils - 1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: android package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
basilisk2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
bochs package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
fs-uae package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qemu package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.5+dfsg-5ubuntu10.42').
slirp package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vde2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
